10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Alqamah narrated:"I heard Abdullah saying: 'I heard the Messenger of Allah saying: "The believer's soul seeps out, and I do not like the death like that of a donkey." They said: "And what is the death of a donkey?" He said: "A sudden death

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّشْدِيدِ عِنْدَ الْمَوْتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Severity Of Death
